name: Steampirates: Rin's Story (Early Access)
description:
Steampirates: Rin’s Story is a Pirate Manager, with a mixture of RPG, VN and dating sims. Take a role of the main adviser and strategist of Rin Breaker to secure her greatness and help her to change the World into a better place.

Game is currently in the early early access, we're constantly working on content updates and we always welcome your feedback. Make the game with us!
